name: "rudderless" color edition
description:
announcingâ€¦the COLOR EDITION of RUDDERLESS! twenty-seven pages of digitally colored goodness documenting my post-grad summer and the thought process that went along with it. 

in the next week rudderless will be available for sale in a handful of indie bookstores, on the lush comics hd ipad app, and in my online shop. anything bought now will be considered a preorder that will ship once the giveaway over on facebook and tumblr ends at midnight on tuesday 10/16.

name: "between boyfriends: a year of dating in new york city" (signed copy)
description: (this is a SIGNED exclusive...unsigned copies can be purchased for just $15 plus shipping over at lulu!) "Kim Gee is 22, single, and living in New York City. After a huge breakup leaves her homeless and heartbroken, she embarks on a yearlong dating extravaganza." my first graphic novel is HERE! (NOTE: the book includes kim gee comics issues #1-6 with the bonus book-exclusive issue #7.) 6x9", 189 pages, full cover color, black and white insides.

name: custom watercolor comic
description:
you supply the story and reference photos, i create a custom comic! great for anniversaries, birthdays, what have you! after you place you order send me an email at kimgee@kimgeeillustration.com so we can discuss the subject matter.

$50/page, watercolor, no limit of pages. 
(also email me at: kimgee@kimgeeillustration.com after placing your order if you would like more than one page so you can be billed accordingly!)

name: kim gee comics issue five
description:
kimgeecomics.com posts on tuesdays and thursdays, but with issue five you can get all the way up to january's posts (pages 105-130) for just $3!  and to celebrate five issues of ridiculousness issue five features a cover with hand painted details, how cute.

kim gee comics is also for sale at quimby's books in chicago, bluestockings in new york city, desert island in brooklyn, and through the lush comics HD ipad app.

i would love to talk about trading zines or art, send me an email and we can discuss! kimgee@kimgeeillustration.com
